titles.title: For the relief of certain aliens who were aboard the Golden Venture.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 1/29/2003--Introduced. Directs the Attorney General to adjust the status of 38 specified persons (who were aboard the Golden Venture) to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence.
